alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Galveston Island; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 05 at 6:54AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT GALVESTON...EAST CENTRAL BRAZORIA AND SOUTHEASTERN HARRIS COUNTIES THROUGH 730 AM CST... At 654 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hitchcock, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... League City, Galveston Causeway, Galveston Island West End, Texas City, Alvin, Dickinson, La Marque, Santa Fe, Seabrook, Webster, Hitchcock, Kemah, Galveston Pier 21, Nassau Bay, Bayou Vista, Clear Lake Shores, Tiki Island, San Leon, Scholes Field, and Offatts Bayou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
